name: Rulebase
long_description: You’ve likely heard, "This call will be recorded for training and monitoring purposes." Usually, this means a person listens to the call, takes notes, and identifies compliance issues while also coaching the customer service representative. We believe large language models can perform quality assurance more efficiently, accurately, and cost-effectively. That’s why we’re building infrastructure to handle quality assurance for both human customer service agents and AI agents.
one_liner: The AI compliance and QA analyst for financial services.
